data.name: Neverwinter Nights: Premium Adventures Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Premium module composer David John evokes adventure, magic, and mystery with these tracks from Wyvern Crown of Cormyr, Pirates of the Sword Coast, and Infinite Dungeons.

All tracks are available in .MP3 format only.

Total Length: 25 min, 30 sec

Track List


01 - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr - Main Theme
02 - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr - Opening
03 - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr - Smoke and Ash
04 - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr - Morfen
05 - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr - Ogma
06 - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr - Armchair
07 - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr - Open Road
08 - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr - Knighted
09 - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr - Solace
10 - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr - Rural
11 - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr - Rural Guitar
12 - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr - Tears
13 - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr - Chase
14 - Pirates of the Sword Coast - Main Theme
15 - Pirates of the Sword Coast - Unused Theme
16 - Infinite Dungeons - Main Theme

data.short_description: All sixteen original Neverwinter Nights premium module tracks composed by David John!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later, Fedora 21, Debian 8
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible
